Summary: Very bright star-like, chng colors, S/W sky darting far left, then right...
trends: there have been 3 other sightings in cms\tg n\a
there were no other sightings in cms\tg n\a on or around february 10th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I were on our way up to bed when a bright movement out the window caught my son's eye. The three of us, my 17 year old, my husband and I saw a very bright light in the night sky. It had a white light quality, very intense, periodically changing colors to red, darting around in the sky to the southwest. It was obvious it was not a helicopter or other, due to the fact that it would dart too quickly to the far left and right, drop down a very far distance and come back up to where it was before. We watched this for almost two hours, as it changed positions, sometimes fading out and then coming back to the same intensity of light. As we were watching it, it just disappeared completely.
